title: PMS 2.0 3:16 - NFL Week 15 Preview, Stone Cold Steve Austin, Steve Kornachi, James Laurinaitis, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about last night's game between the Chargers and Raiders, how Mariota is all the way back, Justin Herbert being an absolute monster, and why the Raiders stink. Joining the show on his birthday is arguably the greatest professional wrestler of all-time, the Texas Rattlesnake, Stone Cold Steve Austin joins the show to chat about his illustrious career, what it was like drinking all those beers on an empty stomach at shows, his acting career, and some of his legendary stories in one of the most anticipated interviews in the shows history (20:52-53:44). Next, OSU Legend, and 8 year NFL veteran James Laurinaitis joins the program to chat about his new career calling games for the Big 10, why he didn't receive some of the same accolades in the NFL that he did in college, being from a wrestling family and if he ever considered that path, and what's next for him (55:33-1:17:03). Next, MSNBC and NBC political correspondent, author, star of election night, and new member of the cast of Football Night in America, Steve Kornachi joins the show to chat about his whirlwind fall, being the best board operator in the history of politics, his new gig with Football Night in America, and how he got into the position he's in right now (1:17:05-1:33:24). Later, Pat and AJ Hawk look ahead to the full week 15 NFL slate and make their picks on each and every game (1:33:26-2:02:04). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
